title: Band, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: cross stitch variation; needle lace edging
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Pattern of tulips, pomegranates and Turkish-like floral forms in reserve against a green silk embroidered background.
